content.value:
Jono, our Executive Chef at the Capital One office in Nottingham, is proud to have cooked over 1,000 meals for kids across Notts who haven’t had access to free school meals over the summer holidays.

Find out about how @OpenKitchensUK works here bit.ly/okJustGiving
